scripts.tb:generate: mkdir -p tinybird/datasources && tb datasource generate --name events__v1 --schema ./src/validation/tinybird-schemas.ts:tinybirdEventSchema --engine MergeTree --output ./tinybird/datasources/events__v1.datasource && tb datasource generate --name interactions__v1 --schema ./src/validation/tinybird-schemas.ts:tinybirdInteractionSchema --engine MergeTree --output ./tinybird/datasources/interactions__v1.datasource
scripts.tb:deploy: bun run tb:generate && bun run tb:push
